tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My wife has been brought in emergency in the morning to the hospital and  the doctor and the nurses attended her immediately and helped her deliver the child by normal delivery. We were taken proper care by Dr.kalpana and the staff . Over all very good and overwhelming experience

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: ** ****** ***** * ** ****** ** **** ****** ** ********* Solve The problem My Wife In Just One Report And done surgery sucessful.very very good staff in Hospital very well behaviour all staff are good never seen such services like kasturi Hospital.I recomend for this hospital for all of my friends who have any problem with them once you can visit

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr. Kalpana is extremely professional. She takes time to listen and time to explain. A first rate professional experience. Completely satisfied with Dr. Kalpana and all the support staff. I recommend every couple who have fertility problem to consult madam and take her advice.

tags: None
review:
Dr. Kalpana is very patient and made an effort to ask all relevant questions about health to do a proper analysis.
She also took time to understand the start of the issue, diagnose well and then suggest proper medication and way to work out the problem.
A smiling and good natured person at heart and that reflects when you speak to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: extremely unprofessional. will keep patients waiting for hours together. Don't expect your wait time for consultation to be less than 4-5 hrs. The doctor will still not express any regret and would simply, "Yes you will have to wait, I did not ask you to come". Absolutely no regards for others time.**** **** *** ** *********** ****** ***** ***** ***** *** *** *** ******  The price of scans/tests/medicines/fees are much higher *** **** ******* ** *********strong recommend to avoid consulting her.
reply_text:
Hello...ur wife was never on time for appointments.She was 3 hrs late for her scan once(which she agreed to) and u both insisted on seeing her immediately without regards for other patients` time- who were on time and waiting befor u.all other visits were with out appointments for which u agreed wen u visited.
And every time u both insisted to be seen immediately  even if others were waiting .In ur last visit (which was again without appointment and in peak hours) u insisted on seeing u again immediately on ur arrival.u both were clearly told waiting time and the emergency delivery doctor had to attend,The need for emergency delivery was clearly explained to u both by the doctor herself by calling u both into her cabin.All other patients who were waiting (before u with appointment) could understand the emergency and were cooperative.But u could not understand and didnot have any regards for the lady who required emergency delivery to save her baby.Seeing this u both were informed that if ur not happy with our services ..u can choose some other hospital for ur further check ups(this was mentioned in ur personal file by the doctor after completing ur scan).All the best for ur further

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Kalpana is pro in treatment of fibroids. I have 11cm of intramural fibroid in uterus. Dr explained everything very patiently, operation was successful. Recovery was very fast. Highly recommend doctor.

I personally feel Dr Kalpana Medam is best Dr, I never meet good DR like Kalpana Medam she treat all the patients equally, and ground support team are also very supportive with the patient they treat very well I strongly recommend everyone who have infertility problem to consult DR Kalpana Medam.

Thank you so much Kalpana Medam for ur support for us.

review: I have waited for almost 2 hours for the consultation. then later on she just checked me for ten mins. later on she refused to address my issues my phone. She doesnt even respond properly to the patients. Least helpful. I had to go to another gynaec for this. I dont suggest her for her behaviour towards patients. She needs to understand the situation and help the patients accordingly.
